T02D1437:233b-1: shr'i bha ga b'an tsakra sam ba ra s'a dha na ratna tsin t'a ma ni n'a ma /
T02D1437:233b-3: bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i
T02D1437:233b-4: thabs rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes
T02D1437:233b-5: bya ba / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1437:233b-6: shr'i chu rgya mtsho tha dad med bzhin he 'dus ma byas nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1437:233b-7: ru lha'i rnga ltar gtso 'khor longs spyod ka yi yid bzhin nor ltar dgos 'dod skong //
T02D1437:233b-8: rnam par thar zhing dus gsum bdud bzhi rten 'brel bcu gnyis bden gnyis sogs //
T02D1437:233b-9: de bzhin ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid bha gang zhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1437:234a-0: bla nor ldan pas gsol btab @234a * //
T02D1437:234a-2: 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1437:234a-3: ji skad gsungs pa'i don bzhin du //
T02D1437:234a-4: bdag gis legs par bshad par bya //
T02D1437:234a-5: ri bo tshad tshid sman ljongs dang //
T02D1437:234a-6: chu bo chen po'i dogs dag dang //
T02D1437:234a-7: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02D1437:234a-8: der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya ;
T02D1437:234a-9: / rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog / dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa //
T02D1437:234a-10: gsang sngags zlos pa'i bzlas brjod dang //
T02D1437:234a-12: mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni //
T02D1437:234a-13: yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste //
T02D1437:234a-14: rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur na //
T02D1437:234a-15: thams cad kyis ni sgrub por gsungs //
T02D1437:234a-16: blta dang dgod dad lag 'dzin dang //
T02D1437:234a-17: 'khyud dang gnyis sprod la sogs la //
T02D1437:234a-18: dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin //
T02D1437:234a-19: rgyud rnams kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1437:234a-20: nang bar sdar langs sems bdag nyid //
T02D1437:234a-21: lus gnas brjod cing lus dag bya //
T02D1437:234a-22: rang gi sa bon 'od zer rgyas //
T02D1437:234a-23: bla ma dang ni dkyil 'khor lha //
T02D1437:234a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub sems sogs kun //
T02D1437:234a-25: nam mkha' kun gang mdun na blta //
T02D1437:234a-26: lus sna tshogs kyis phyag btsal zhing //
T02D1437:234a-27: de dag 'gro ba'i don du dbul /
T02D1437:234a-28: h'um gi 'od zer las byung ba'i //
T02D1437:234a-29: gzugs ma sgra ma dri ro ma //
T02D1437:234a-30: reg ma chos ma zhi ba ma //
T02D1437:234a-31: dkar sngo ser dmar ljang dkar mo //
T02D1437:234a-32: zhal gcig phyag bzhi g-yon thod tv'am //
T02D1437:234a-33: g-yas rnams me long pi wang dang //
T02D1437:234a-34: dri mchog ro mchog na bza' dang //
T02D1437:234a-35: chos 'byung dang ni da ma ru //
T02D1437:234a-36: aom a'a: badzra a'a dar she h'um /
T02D1437:234a-37: aom a'a: badzra b'i ne h'um /
T02D1437:234a-40: aom a'a: badzra spar she h'um /
T02D1437:234a-41: aom a'a: badzra dha rme h'um /
T02D1437:234a-43: bdud rtsi lnga yis lha yid gang //
T02D1437:234a-44: snyoms 'jug lhan cig skyes dga' yin //
T02D1437:234a-45: lha mo rnams dang mchod pas dgyes //
T02D1437:234a-46: sdig pa bshags bsdams rjes yi rang //
T02D1437:234a-47: dge ba longs bsngo skyabs 'gro bya //
T02D1437:234a-48: chos 'khor bskor bskul bzhugs gsol gdab //
T02D1437:234a-49: byang chub smon 'jug sems bskyed bshags //
T02D1437:234a-50: khyad 'phags bde sbyor byams pa ste //
T02D1437:234a-51: sdug bsngal rgyu bral snying rje che //
T02D1437:234a-53: nyon mongs nye bral btang snyoms so //
T02D1437:234a-54: chos kun ngo bo nyid med pa //
T02D1437:234b-0: kun rtog sgyu ma @234b lta bur shes //
T02D1437:234b-1: aom sva bh'a bshuddha: sarbba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhoo& ham /
T02D1437:234b-2: sa bon 'od kyis brtan g-yo spyangs //
T02D1437:234b-3: thig le sngags kyis dmigs pa med //
T02D1437:234b-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1437:234b-5: chos kun rab tu gnas med pa //
T02D1437:234b-6: 'od gsal nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1437:234b-7: yi ge ae las chos 'byung ste ;
T02D1437:234b-8: / h'um gyur bde chen phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1437:234b-9: shar sogs lugs dang mi mthun dang //
T02D1437:234b-10: lugs mthun g-yon mdzub se gol gtogs //
T02D1437:234b-11: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-12: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-13: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-15: bha ga b'an badzra h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-16: khva gdang ma sogs phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1437:234b-17: dmar mo g-yon brkyang nyi ma'i gdan //
T02D1437:234b-18: rang 'dra stong phur g-yon pa na //
T02D1437:234b-19: g-yas pa tho ba thogs pa'o //
T02D1437:234b-20: rdo rje ra ba sa gzhi gur //
T02D1437:234b-21: bla re mda' yi dra ba bya //
T02D1437:234b-22: aom badzra pr'a ka ra h'um pam h'um /
T02D1437:234b-23: aom me di ni badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1437:234b-24: aom badzra panytsa ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1437:234b-25: aom badzra bi d'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1437:234b-26: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram h'um gyur dngos po brgyad nang du //
T02D1437:234b-27: bgegs rnams bcug la phur bu gzugs //
T02D1437:234b-28: aom gha: gha: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarbba dusht'a na h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-29: k'a le ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-30: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ra
T02D1437:234b-31: a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya b'a ka tsitta
T02D1437:234b-32: badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-33: aom badzra mudga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta h'um phat /
T02D1437:234b-34: tho bas brdungs te phur pas btab //
T02D1437:234b-35: bgegs rnams rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur //
T02D1437:234b-38: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um /
T02D1437:234b-39: aom padma pr'a k'a ra h'um /
T02D1437:234b-40: aom tsakra pr'a k'a ra h'um /
T02D1437:234b-41: aom badzra dzva la aa na larka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1437:234b-42: ba lang gnas dang lteng lding dang //
T02D1437:234b-43: lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas //
T02D1437:234b-44: dung chen po yi rang bzhin bya //
T02D1437:234b-45: yang na rus sbal dag gi'o //
T02D1437:234b-46: ri rab kyi steng sna tshogs padma'i lte bar h'um
T02D1437:234b-47: yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje chen
T02D1437:234b-48: po ste / de'i lte bar bh'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1437:234b-49: rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i khang
T02D1437:234b-50: pa brtse gsum gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
T02D1437:234b-51: / rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1437:234b-52: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1437:234b-53: pi wang sogs lha stegs bur 'khod //
T02D1437:234b-54: rgyan phreng sogs pa bdun gyis brgyan //
T02D1437:234b-55: bdun bcu gnyis rlung bskyod sgra //
T02D1437:234b-56: gnas phyogs shing zhing rlung sprin dang //
T02D1437:235a-2: khang nang sna tshogs pad 'dab brgyad //
T02D1437:235a-3: mtha' ma gri gug phreng 'khor gsum //
T02D1437:235a-4: pad steng 'jigs byed dus mtshan brtsigs //
T02D1437:235a-5: snying gar nyin mo'i dbang phyug gdan //
T02D1437:235a-6: phyogs 'dab srog song snying ri bong //
T02D1437:235a-7: mtshams steng zla bum thod bdud rtsi //
T02D1437:235a-8: ri steng sna tshogs padma yi //
T02D1437:235a-9: lte par a'a li k'a li skyes //
T02D1437:235a-10: dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing //
T02D1437:235a-11: rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud //
T02D1437:235a-12: nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyed ldan pa'i //
T02D1437:235a-13: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can //
T02D1437:235a-14: shr'i he ru ka rgyal po chen po'o //
T02D1437:235a-15: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya//
T02D1437:235a-16: bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1437:235a-17: sku mdog sngon po zhal bzhi pa //
T02D1437:235a-18: drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1437:235a-19: g-yas brkyang pa yi gom pas bzhugs //
T02D1437:235a-20: rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing nag 'bar //
T02D1437:235a-21: g-yon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog / g-yas pa gser du 'bar ba ste //
T02D1437:235a-22: steng zhal ma ra ka tar 'bar //
T02D1437:235a-23: dmar zlum spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1437:235a-24: ral pa thor tshugs dar dpyang can //
T02D1437:235a-25: thod pa lnga yis dbul brgyan //
T02D1437:235a-26: zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes //
T02D1437:235a-27: dus min 'chi ba las rgyal ba //
T02D1437:235a-28: yan lag kha tv'am ga dang sbyar //
T02D1437:235a-29: thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni //
T02D1437:235a-30: zhal du mtshon cha nges par sbyar //
T02D1437:235a-31: lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag can //
T02D1437:235a-32: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing //
T02D1437:235a-33: dpe byad bzad po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D1437:235a-34: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dgu ldan //
T02D1437:235a-35: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02D1437:235a-36: phyag rgya drug gis rab tu mdzes //
T02D1437:235a-37: mgo phreng do shal chen po can //
T02D1437:235a-38: steng nas gdugs dkar legs par 'dzin //
T02D1437:235a-39: de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni //
T02D1437:235a-40: rdo rje phyag mo rab 'jigs ma //
T02D1437:235a-41: he ru ka dpal phyogs byas nas //
T02D1437:235a-42: spyan gsum drag mo'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1437:235a-43: ka p'a li ni aan tras bkang //
T02D1437:235a-44: kha nas ru ti ra 'dzag cing //
T02D1437:235a-45: lha dang lha min mir bcas pa//
T02D1437:235a-46: phyogs kun du ni sdigs mdzub byed //
T02D1437:235a-47: sku mdog dmar mo cher 'bar ma //
T02D1437:235a-48: zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1437:235a-49: phyag g-yon thod khrag thabs la 'khyud //
T02D1437:235a-50: g-yas pa rdo rje gri gug 'dzin /
T02D1437:235a-51: skra grol rnam mdzes rgyan lnga ldan //
T02D1437:235a-52: sgeg cing nu ma 'bur la mkhrang //
T02D1437:235b-0: g-yon brkyang @235b gom pa thabs dang sbyar //
T02D1437:235b-1: g-yas pa yab kyi bral steng 'khyud //
T02D1437:235b-2: thugs kar shes rab rab 'gyur nyid //
T02D1437:235b-3: sna tshogs padma nyi rdor h'um //
T02D1437:235b-4: sku gsung thugs rdo rjer byin brlab //
T02D1437:235b-5: gsum gsum de ni yi ge gsum //
T02D1437:235b-6: gang dag rab sgrub byed pa'i sngags //
T02D1437:235b-7: de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad ;
T02D1437:235b-8: / phan tshun brgyus pa'i gsang sngags ni //
T02D1437:235b-9: yul nyid kyis ni phye ba'o //
T02D1437:235b-10: kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang //
T02D1437:235b-11: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pa'o //
T02D1437:235b-12: ya sde brgyad pa'i sa bon dang //
T02D1437:235b-13: de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi //
T02D1437:235b-14: yi ge bar ma dor byas la //
T02D1437:235b-15: yan lag drug he ru kar brjod //
T02D1437:235b-16: yi ge re res yang dag gnas //
T02D1437:235b-17: aom na ma sv'a h'a boo sha ta /
T02D1437:235b-18: h'um h'um phat dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1437:235b-19: phat h'um hrem hrim ham aom rnams //
T02D1437:235b-20: yi ge bam dang yom dang ni //
T02D1437:235b-21: yi ge mom dang hrim nyid dang //
T02D1437:235b-22: h'um dang phat ces sbyar ba ni //
T02D1437:235b-23: rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad //
T02D1437:235b-24: thabs dang shes rab go cha yin //
T02D1437:235b-25: mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yang //
T02D1437:235b-26: bye ba grangs med pa yis bskor //
T02D1437:235b-27: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02D1437:235b-28: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can dang //
T02D1437:235b-29: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub ma //
T02D1437:235b-30: padma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod //
T02D1437:235b-31: sngon mo ljang khu dmar mo ser //
T02D1437:235b-32: zhal gcig skra grol phrag bzhi ma //
T02D1437:235b-33: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga //
T02D1437:235b-34: g-yas pa gri gug da ma ru //
T02D1437:235b-35: spyan gsum lang tsho gzhon nu rgyas //
T02D1437:235b-36: khro mo ral pa mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1437:235b-37: de nas gzhan yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1437:235b-38: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa l'a ma /
T02D1437:235b-39: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dum skyes ma //
T02D1437:235b-40: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzugs can //
T02D1437:235b-41: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpal he ru ka rdo rje'o //
T02D1437:235b-42: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1437:235b-43: ye shes dkyil 'khor dbang bskur lha //
T02D1437:235b-44: phyo gsang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams //
T02D1437:235b-45: spyan drangs bgegs bskrad mchod yon dbul //
T02D1437:235b-46: aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a ;
T02D1437:235b-47: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas /
T02D1437:235b-48: dgug dang gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes //
T02D1437:235b-49: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1437:235b-50: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu bas gang bas /
T02D1437:236a-0: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa @236a * //
T02D1437:236a-1: bhi she ka sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um zhes dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1437:236a-2: dkyil 'khor gtso la rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya //
T02D1437:236a-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mi ba skyod pa //
T02D1437:236a-4: mkha' 'gro l'a ma dum skyes gzugs can ma //
T02D1437:236a-5: rtag pa don grub dpag med rin chen 'byung //
T02D1437:236a-6: lha mo drug dang bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D1437:236a-7: phyi dang gsang bas yang dag mchod //
T02D1437:236a-8: dkyil 'khor lha rnams legs bstod nas //
T02D1437:236a-9: rang rang gnas su yud kyis gshegs //
T02D1437:236a-10: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang //
T02D1437:236a-11: sngags kyi dgod par rab tu grags //
T02D1437:236a-12: myur du dngos grub byed par ni //
T02D1437:236a-13: phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med //
T02D1437:236a-14: mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyor te //
T02D1437:236a-15: mkha' 'gro dpa' mo gnyis med pa //
T02D1437:236a-16: snying po sngags kyis de bzhin du //
T02D1437:236a-17: sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyor //
T02D1437:236a-18: aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra he he ru ru kam a'a: h'um h'um phat /
T02D1437:236a-19: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yis //
T02D1437:236a-20: dkyil 'khor par bcas mnyes par bya //
T02D1437:236a-21: phyi rol shin tu dga' bya la'ang //
T02D1437:236a-22: pad rdor byin brlab 'di dag byung //
T02D1437:236a-23: mdun du yi ge yam las rlung dkyil 'khor //
T02D1437:236a-24: gzhur snang sngon po mtha' gnyis ba dan ldan //
T02D1437:236a-25: de steng yi ge ram las me dkyil 'khor //
T02D1437:236a-26: zur gsum nyid las dmar po 'bar bas mtshan //
T02D1437:236a-27: de steng aa las padma'i snod //
T02D1437:236a-28: dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po //
T02D1437:236a-30: dri chu dri chen sha chen po //
T02D1437:236a-31: byang chub sems rang byung me tog / l'am m'am p'am t'am /
T02D1437:236a-32: ba lang khyi dang glang po che //
T02D1437:236a-33: rta sgron kun la sa bon ldan //
T02D1437:236a-34: rlung gis me spar bdud rtsi dmar por zhu //
T02D1437:236a-35: h'um dkar kha tv'am dkar la bsil //
T02D1437:236a-36: a'a li k'a li thog mtha' ldan brjod pas //
T02D1437:236a-37: kha dog sna tshogs bdud rtsi'i steng du 'khod //
T02D1437:236a-38: yongs gyur aom a'a: h'um gsum gong nas gong //
T02D1437:236a-39: 'od zer tshogs 'phros nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1437:236a-40: bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes bdud rtsi bkug / yig gsum la thim gsum thim des byin brlab //
T02D1437:236a-41: bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams lce //
T02D1437:236a-42: yi ge h'um byung rdo rje rtse gsum pa //
T02D1437:236a-43: dkar po nas 'bru tsam bkod sbu gus drangs //
T02D1437:236a-44: bdud rtsi gsol bas lha tshogs tshim par blta //
T02D1437:236a-45: rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ste rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang //
T02D1437:236b-0: bzlas brjod bya ba'i sngags kyi yi ge gang dang yin @236b pa rnams //
T02D1437:236b-1: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02D1437:236b-2: 'og nas 'byung ba rang gi rdo rje'i rtse mo las phyag rgya'i bha gar bton nas /
T02D1437:236b-3: yang lha mo'i zhal du zhugs pa rang gi sa bon la zhugs par blta zhing /
T02D1437:236b-4: zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang zlos par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1437:236b-5: khro bo'i bzlas pa yang bya'o //
T02D1437:236b-6: rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral
T02D1437:236b-7: bas sems mnyam par gzhag pa ji srid skyo bar
T02D1437:236b-8: ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1437:236b-9: bzlas brjod kyi gsang sngags ni 'di dag yin te /
T02D1437:236b-10: aom badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat
T02D1437:236b-11: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a
T02D1437:236b-12: / aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat lha'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1437:236b-13: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-14: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1437:236b-15: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1437:236b-16: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-17: aom l'a ma ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-18: aom khanda ro hi hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-19: aom r'u pi ni ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-20: dpa' mo rnams kyi sngags so //
T02D1437:236b-21: aom na mo bha ga ba ti wi re sh'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-22: aom ma h'a kal p'agni sanni bh'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-23: aom dza ta ma kutotka t'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-24: aom dam shtr'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-25: aom sa ha sra bhu dzabh'a su r'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-26: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dy'a ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ra ni hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-27: aom by'aghr'a dzi n'am ba ra dha r'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-28: aom ma h'a dhumth'a na dha ka ra wa push'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1437:236b-30: ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru bandha bandha /
T02D1437:236b-31: tra sa ya tra sa ya /
T02D1437:236b-32: ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
T02D1437:236b-33: hroom hroom hra: hra: phem phem phat phat da ha da ha /
T02D1437:236b-35: bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi r'an tra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni /
T02D1437:236b-36: grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarba mb'a tardza ya tardza ya /
T02D1437:236b-50: gang tshe bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na //
T02D1437:236b-51: sa bon 'od kyis shes rab bdag po dang //
T02D1437:236b-52: 'khor lo pa dang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams //
T02D1437:236b-53: snang bar byas te 'od gyur rim bzhin bsdu //
T02D1437:236b-54: h'um de yongs gyur pa las bdag nyid ni //
T02D1437:236b-55: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas brkyang gom pas gnas //
T02D1437:236b-56: lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying ba mtshan dang ldan //
T02D1437:236b-57: phyag rgya drug ldan dril bu rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1437:237a-1: bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02D1437:237a-2: yi ge brgya pa brjod pa yang byas la /
T02D1437:237a-3: lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1437:237a-4: gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams su //
T02D1437:237a-5: bsam gtan khang par stan bder 'dug / bdag nyid 'od zer du gyur pa //
T02D1437:237a-6: h'um du gyur de yongs gyur las ;
T02D1437:237a-7: / bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog gi //
T02D1437:237a-9: khang brtsegs rin chen tshogs las grub //
T02D1437:237a-10: dur khrod brgyad bskor gsal dmigs nas //
T02D1437:237a-11: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02D1437:237a-12: thun tha ma la ni sngar bstan pa'i cho ga thams cad spyad la /
T02D1437:237a-13: bzlas brjod kyi rjes la h'um gi 'od zer gyis
T02D1437:237a-14: thams cad 'od du gyur pa dkyil 'khor bdag po
T02D1437:237a-15: la bsdus la / dkyil 'khor gtso bo dang bcas pa phyag rgya dang bcas pa yang /
T02D1437:237a-16: 'od du gyur pa snying ga yi //
T02D1437:237a-17: shes rab rab gyur yab yum la //
T02D1437:237a-18: de yang snying ga'i nyi bcas h'um //
T02D1437:237a-19: nyi ma au ha mgo zla tshes //
T02D1437:237a-20: thig le n'a da'i bar bsdus la //
T02D1437:237a-21: der yang dmigs med gnyid la 'jug / nang par
T02D1437:237a-22: gyi dus su rdo rje rnal 'byor mas glus bskul
T02D1437:237a-23: bas sad par mos par byas la /
T02D1437:237a-24: cho ga thams cad nyi ma snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1437:237a-25: de ltar gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pas sems brtan par gyur pa dang /
T02D1437:237a-26: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1437:237a-29: me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs //
T02D1437:237a-30: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang //
T02D1437:237a-31: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D1437:237a-32: glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1437:237a-33: mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed //
T02D1437:237a-35: dam tshig ldan zhing bla ma la gus dang //
T02D1437:237a-36: bsgom bsgrub brtson la dngos grub thams cad 'byung //
T02D1437:237a-37: tshe dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D1437:237a-38: dpal dang gzi brjid dbang phyug las rnams 'grub //
T02D1437:237a-39: bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas rtsom pa chen por 'gyur //
T02D1437:237a-40: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D1437:237a-41: bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog gi //
T02D1437:237a-42: sgrub thabs tshul bzhin byas pa las //
T02D1437:237a-43: dge ba thob pa gang yin des //
T02D1437:237b-0: 'gro kun rdor @237b 'dzin rgyal gyur cig / bcom
T02D1437:237b-1: ldan 'das 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin
T02D1437:237b-2: po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob
T02D1437:237b-3: dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas
T02D1437:237b-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti k'irti dang /
T02D1437:237b-7: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mkhas pa mar pa chos
